message.entry: Select the type of write operation
Select the MATLAB data type to write
Specify the numeric or ASCII data to write
Select the workspace variable to write

entry.note: Sends data according to predefined configurations

message.entry: Write data using the specified settings
The value to write is empty. Specify the value to write in the "Data to Write" box or select a value from the "Workspace Variable" list.
The evaluated string value to write must be a scalar.
The value to write must be either a 1-by-n or n-by-1 array.
Invalid data type. The data to write must be, or must evaluate to, a numeric or ASCII value.
The Write Section Controller needs to be a "matlabshared.transportapp.internal.toolstrip.write.IController".

To write string scalar data or char array data that contains double-quotes, create a variable in the workspace and assign your data with double-quotes to it. Then, select this variable from the "Workspace Variable" list.
